title: submission
description: Raw tabular data submitted by UCL

months.diag.description: Months that elapsed since prostate cancer diagnosis

mccl.description: Maximum Cancer Core Length in mm

loc.description: Sampled area location (Posterior, Anterior or combinations)

level.description: Sampled area level (Base, Mid-gland, Apex or combinations)

likert.description: Likert score of sampled MRI area

pirads.description: PI-RADSv2 score of sampled MRI area

precise.description: PRECISE score of sampled MRI area (only for timepoint B)

adcMean.description: Mean apparent diffusion coefficient of sampled MRI area

adcn.description: Mean apparent diffusion coefficient of sampled MRI area (normalised by contralateral benign prostate ADC)

adcu.description: Mean apparent diffusion coefficient of sampled MRI area (normalised by urine ADC)

best.description: MRI sequence on which lesion is best seen

bestVol.description: Volume of lesion on best sequence (ml)

Epi_Count.description: Total number of epithelial cells within all tissue areas on H&E

Stroma_Count.description: Total number of stromal cells within all tissue areas on H&E

Lymphocyte_Count.description: Total number of lymphocytes within all tissue areas on H&E

Lymphocyte_Percentage.description: % of lymphocytes within all tissue areas on H&E

Irani_Gscore.description: Irani score (number of lymphocytes in largest inflammatory cluster)

Lumen_Area.description: Total area detected as lumen within all tissue areas (square mm)

Annotated_Cancer_Area.description: Total area of cancer annotated by pathologist

Normal_Area.description: Area classified as normal by classifier

PIN_Area.description: Area classified as PIN by classifier

Gleason_3_Area.description: Area classified as G3 by classifier

Gleason_4_Area.description: Area classified as G4 by classifier

Gleason_5_Area.description: Area classified as G5 or higher by classifier
